H0.text: Juan Valdez advertises the coffee of which country. Brazil

H1.text: Juan Valdez advertises the coffee of which country. Mexico

H2.text: Juan Valdez advertises the coffee of which country. Guatemala

H3.text: Juan Valdez advertises the coffee of which country. Colombia

A4.text: Juan Valdez coffee is used as an ingredient brand, to specifically denote coffee beans that are only grown and harvested in Colombia.

A5.text: The advertisements were designed by the Doyle Dane Bernbach ad agency, with the goal of distinguishing 100%-Colombian coffee from coffee blended with beans from other countries.
